privacy.title: Privacy Protection
privacy.description: No registration required, no personal information collected, completely anonymous

temporary.title: Temporary Email
temporary.description: 24-hour validity period, automatic expiration and deletion, avoid spam troubles

anonymous.title: Anonymous Reception
anonymous.description: Protect your real email address, prevent information leakage and harassment

instant.title: Instant Creation
instant.description: One-click generation of temporary email, ready to use immediately, simple and convenient

verification.title: One-time Verification
verification.description: Receive verification codes, confirmation emails and other temporary verification needs

downloads.title: Software Downloads
downloads.description: Avoid marketing emails when downloading software and getting resources

testing.title: Testing & Verification
testing.description: Ideal tool for development testing and email verification functions

security.title: Security Notice
security.warning1: Do not use for receiving important or sensitive information, temporary email does not guarantee data security
security.warning2: Email content may be accessed by others, please avoid including personal privacy information
security.warning3: The mailbox will be automatically deleted after 24 hours, please save important content in time

q1.question: How long is the mailbox valid?
q1.answer: All mailboxes are valid for 24 hours and will be automatically deleted after expiration.

q2.question: Can I send emails?
q2.answer: This service only supports receiving emails, not sending emails.

q3.question: Is email content secure?
q3.answer: All email content is only stored during the validity period and will be automatically deleted after expiration. Please check important information in time.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read the following terms carefully before using this temporary email service. Using the service means you agree to this agreement.

section1.title: 1. Service Description
section1.item1: This service provides users with temporary, anonymous email addresses for receiving emails, verification codes and other information.
section1.item2: All mailboxes and email content are temporarily stored and automatically deleted after expiration, and cannot be recovered.

section2.title: 2. User Responsibilities
section2.item1: Users should comply with relevant laws and regulations and shall not use this service for any illegal, irregular or harmful activities.
section2.item2: Users should bear all risks and responsibilities arising from the use of this service.

section3.title: 3. Prohibited Behaviors
section3.item1: Shall not be used to send or receive spam, malware, phishing information and other illegal content.
section3.item2: Shall not be used for harassment, fraud, infringement of others' privacy or intellectual property rights.
section3.item3: Shall not attempt to attack, interfere with or destroy the normal operation of this service.

section4.title: 4. Disclaimer
section4.item1: This service is a free open source project, provided "as is", and makes no commitment to the availability, stability or data integrity of the service.
section4.item2: The developer assumes no responsibility for any direct or indirect losses caused by the use of this service.

section5.title: 5. Service Changes and Termination
section5.item1: We have the right to adjust, suspend or terminate the service content at any time without prior notice to users.
section5.item2: If users are found to have violations, we have the right to restrict or terminate their use of this service.

section6.title: 6. Applicable Law
section6.item1: The interpretation and application of these terms of use are governed by the relevant laws and regulations of the open source project hosting location.

section7.title: 7. Terms Changes
section7.item1: We have the right to modify these terms of use at any time as needed, and changes will be announced in a prominent position on the page.

terms.conclusion: Thank you for using zmail temporary email service!

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn about the background and philosophy of zmail temporary email service.

intro.title: Project Introduction
intro.content: zmail is an open source temporary email service designed to provide users with secure and convenient temporary email solutions. We are committed to protecting user privacy and avoiding spam troubles.

free.title: Completely Free
free.desc: No registration required, no payment required, completely free to use.

instant.title: Instant Generation
instant.desc: Generate temporary email addresses with one click, ready to use immediately.

autodestroy.title: Auto Destroy
autodestroy.desc: Mailboxes are automatically destroyed after 24 hours to protect privacy.

realtime.title: Real-time Receiving
realtime.desc: Receive emails in real time with auto-refresh support.

opensource.title: Open Source Transparency
opensource.desc: Code is completely open source, secure and trustworthy.

tech.title: Technical Architecture
tech.intro: zmail is built with modern technology stack:

email.title: Email Service
email.desc: Based on CloudFlare email service to provide free temporary mailboxes, stable and reliable

opensource.title: Open Source Information
opensource.intro: zmail is a completely open source project that follows the MIT open source license. We welcome community contributions, suggestions or issue reports.

contribute.title: Contribution Guide
contribute.desc: Welcome to submit Pull Requests and Issues

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you encounter problems during use, or have any suggestions and feedback, please contact us through the following methods:

github.title: GitHub Issues
github.desc: Submit Issues in the project repository

about.conclusion: Thank you for choosing zmail temporary email service!

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We take your privacy protection very seriously. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use and protect your information.

section1.title: Information Collection
section1.item1: We do not require users to register or provide personal information.
section1.item2: We do not collect users' names, email addresses or other personal identification information.
section1.item3: We may collect anonymous usage statistics, such as visit counts and usage time, to improve service quality.

section2.title: Information Use
section2.item1: Temporary email addresses are only used to receive emails and will not be used for other purposes.
section2.item2: We will not sell, trade or transfer any of your information to third parties.
section2.item3: Collected anonymous statistics are only used for analysis and service improvement.

section3.title: Data Storage
section3.item1: All email content is temporarily stored in memory and will not be persisted to disk.
section3.item2: Mailboxes and their contents are automatically deleted after 24 hours and cannot be recovered.
section3.item3: We do not keep backups of any user data.

section4.title: Third-party Services
section4.item1: This website may use third-party analytics tools (such as Google Analytics) to understand website usage.
section4.item2: These third-party services have their own privacy policies, and we recommend that you review the relevant policies.
section4.item3: We are not responsible for the privacy practices of third-party services.

section5.title: Cookie Usage
section5.item1: We may use cookies to improve user experience, such as saving language preferences.
section5.item2: You can disable cookies through browser settings, but this may affect website functionality.
section5.item3: We do not use cookies to track personal identification information.

section6.title: Security Measures
section6.item1: We adopt appropriate technical and administrative measures to protect data security.
section6.item2: All data transmission is encrypted through HTTPS.
section6.item3: Although we strive to protect data security, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

section7.title: Policy Changes
section7.item1: We may update this privacy policy from time to time.
section7.item2: Significant changes will be announced in a prominent position on the website.
section7.item3: Continued use of the service indicates your acceptance of the updated policy.

section8.title: Contact Us
section8.item1: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us through GitHub Issues.

privacy.conclusion: Thank you for trusting and using zmail temporary email service!
